Title: An Urgent Plea
Description:
<Your mind is racked with a howl. Beneath it, a wispy voice is barely audible, as if from far away.>

Please... help... heart of the ruins... a ritual... conjuring...

...should not be here...

My staff... on the altar... take it. Please hurry.
ObjectivesText: Recover the Staff of Pei-Zhi and interrupt the mogu ritual in the center of the Terrace of Ten Thunders.
PortraitGiverText: Take my staff from the altar and charge it with Ancient Spirits!
CompletionText:
Spirit-binding! How can the mogu have been allowed to resume such a disgusting practice?! And now here I am, the product of a half-failed conjuring...

<The spirit fumes for a moment, then turns to you.>

What century is this?
RewardText:
Allow me to introduce myself: I am Pei-Zhi, Master Spiritsage under the last pandaren emperor Shaohao.

At least... I was.
